name: Interval training
description: Interval training is simply alternating short bursts (about 30 seconds) of intense activity with longer intervals (about 1 to 2 minutes).

name: Full Body Workout
description: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out

name: Yoga
description: The term yoga in the Western world often denotes a modern form of hatha yoga and a posture-based physical fitness

name: Walking Running
description: Walking and running are both excellent forms of cardiovascular exercise. Neither is necessarily “better” than the other.

name: Yoga Hero Pose
description: Hero Pose is a kneeling  in modern yoga as exercise. Medieval hatha yoga texts describe a cross-legged meditation under the same name

name: Squats
description: Squats target the quads,calves and core so this exercise can play a role to make your butt bigger when performed consistently over time.

name: Head To Knee Forward bend
description: Your right shin and left thigh should form a 90 degree angle square your hips forward gently rotating them with your arms. Now raise your arms over your head lengthen through the spine.

name: Bound Angle Pose
description: Bound Angle Pose, Butterfly Pose, or Cobbler's Pose, and historically called Bhadrasana, Throne Pose, is a seated yoga and modern yoga as exercise. If the knees rest on the floor.
